message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I think it will be very valuable to you, and this is a competitive price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me.  Could you meet me at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still believe that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that respects both our positions.
